Whitemane.name: Desperate Plea
Whitemane.description: Heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and gain Desperation for 4 seconds.  Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 60, and stacks up to 3 times.  Current Mana Cost: 30

Whitemane.name: Inquisition
Whitemane.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for up to 3 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds and Slowing them by 30%.

Whitemane.name: Searing Lash
Whitemane.description: After 0.5 seconds, smite enemies in a straight line for 78 (+4% per level) damage.  If the first strike hits an enemy Hero, a second strike will occur after a short delay.

Whitemane.name: Scarlet Aegis
Whitemane.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

Whitemane.name: Divine Reckoning
Whitemane.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

Whitemane.name: Zeal
Whitemane.description: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds.  Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.

1.name: Martyrdom
1.description: Each stack of Desperation increases Desperate Plea's healing by 30%.

1.name: Clemency
1.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 350 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds while Channeling.  Passive: Reduce Inquisition's cooldown by 4 seconds.

1.name: Righteous Flame
1.description: Searing Lash deals 75% more damage to enemies who are Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed.

1.name: Pity the Frail
1.description: Allies below 50% Health receive 25% more healing from Zeal.

4.name: Unwavering Faith
4.description: Reduce Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 15.  Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, gain a 250 (+4% per level) Shield for 5 seconds.

4.name: High Inquisitor
4.description: Casting Inquisition instantly removes all stacks of Desperation and restores 75 Mana per stack removed.

4.name: Indulgence
4.description: Searing Lash's first strike restores 20 Mana per Hero hit, and its second strike restores 40 Mana per Hero hit.

7.name: Zealous Spirit
7.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

7.name: Fanatical Power
7.description: Activate to gain 50% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds.

7.name: Intercession
7.description: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

10.name: Scarlet Aegis
10.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

10.name: Divine Reckoning
10.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

13.name: Self-Righteous
13.description: Casting Desperate Plea on an ally heals Whitemane for 125 (+4% per level). Does not grant Zeal.

13.name: Harsh Discipline
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Guiding Light
13.description: Whenever Zeal is applied to allies other than Whitemane, it grants them 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

16.name: Radiance
16.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level).

16.name: Shared Punishment
16.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Lashing Out
16.description: Searing Lash's second strike deals 25% more damage and reduces Searing Lash's cooldown to 1 second if it hits a Hero.

20.name: Scarlet Crusade
20.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1 second.

20.name: Judgment Day
20.description: Divine Reckoning deals 30% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

20.name: Subjugation
20.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 75%.

20.name: Purge the Wicked
20.description: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.
